```{r makecondition}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Input 

```{r makecondition_input}
input_bins = 30

```

## Output UI input rendering

```{r render_uiBins}
render_uiBins <- shiny::renderUI
```

```{r output_uiBins}
output_uiBins <- sliderInput("bins",
                        "Number of bins:",
                        min = 1,
                        max = 50,
                        value = 30)
```


## Output rendering

  * must have `render_outputId` and `output_outputId` objects.
  
  * `render_outputId` has render function as its value, which will be used to generate proper server.R

```{r render_distPlot}
render_distPlot <- shiny::renderPlot
```

```{r output_distPlot}
output_distPlot <-  {
    ggplot(data=faithful) +
      geom_histogram(
        aes(x=eruptions), bins=as.numeric(input_bins)
      )

}

```
